sentence.Network_en: However, stress - induced hyperglycemia does not usually in glucosuria ( elevated urine glucose ) .

sentence.Network_en: Conclusions - Both admission and post admission hyperglycemia predict 30 - day death in AMI patients.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论 - 在AMI中,入院时和入院后高血糖均可预测30天内的高死亡率.

sentence.Network_en: Tagatose, a natural low - calorie sweetener, has many physiological functions including - hyperglycemia - biotic effects and - cariogenicity.
sentence.Network_cn: 塔格糖是一种天然的低能量填充型甜味剂, 并具有抑制高血糖、改善肠道菌群和不致龋齿等多种生理功效.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 胰岛素缺乏或其受体异常，不能对抗由肾上腺素、胰高血糖素、肾上腺皮质激素等引起的血糖升高作用，导致高血糖(hyperglycemia) …
高血糖症（hyperglycemia）是指空腹血糖高于正常上限7.3mmol/L(130mg/dl)，血糖高于肾糖阈值9.0mmol/L(160mg/dl)，则出现尿糖。
